00052 class IndexFor {
00053     private:
00055         long                _index;
00056 
00058         std::vector<long>   _sum;
00059 
00061         std::vector<size_t> _state;
00062 
00064         std::vector<size_t> _ranges;
00065 
00066     public:
00068         IndexFor() : _index(-1) {}
00069 
00071         IndexFor( const VarSet& indexVars, const VarSet& forVars ) : _state( forVars.size(), 0 ) {
00072             long sum = 1;
00073 
00074             _ranges.reserve( forVars.size() );
00075             _sum.reserve( forVars.size() );
00076 
00077             VarSet::const_iterator j = forVars.begin();
00078             for( VarSet::const_iterator i = indexVars.begin(); i != indexVars.end(); ++i ) {
00079                 for( ; j != forVars.end() && *j <= *i; ++j ) {
00080                     _ranges.push_back( j->states() );
00081                     _sum.push_back( (*i == *j) ? sum : 0 );
00082                 }
00083                 sum *= i->states();
00084             }
00085             for( ; j != forVars.end(); ++j ) {
00086                 _ranges.push_back( j->states() );
00087                 _sum.push_back( 0 );
00088             }
00089             _index = 0;
00090         }
00091 
00093         IndexFor& reset() {
00094             fill( _state.begin(), _state.end(), 0 );
00095             _index = 0;
00096             return( *this );
00097         }
00098 
00100         operator size_t() const {
00101             DAI_ASSERT( valid() );
00102             return( _index );
00103         }
00104 
00106         IndexFor& operator++ () {
00107             if( _index >= 0 ) {
00108                 size_t i = 0;
00109 
00110                 while( i < _state.size() ) {
00111                     _index += _sum[i];
00112                     if( ++_state[i] < _ranges[i] )
00113                         break;
00114                     _index -= _sum[i] * _ranges[i];
00115                     _state[i] = 0;
00116                     i++;
00117                 }
00118 
00119                 if( i == _state.size() )
00120                     _index = -1;
00121             }
00122             return( *this );
00123         }
00124 
00126         void operator++( int ) {
00127             operator++();
00128         }
00129 
00131         bool valid() const {
00132             return( _index >= 0 );
00133         }
00134 };

00141 class Permute {
00142     private:
00144         std::vector<size_t>  _ranges;
00146         std::vector<size_t>  _sigma;
00147 
00148     public:
00150         Permute() : _ranges(), _sigma() {}
00151 
00153         Permute( const std::vector<size_t> &rs, const std::vector<size_t> &sigma ) : _ranges(rs), _sigma(sigma) {
00154             DAI_ASSERT( _ranges.size() == _sigma.size() );
00155         }
00156 
00158 
00161         Permute( const std::vector<Var> &vars ) : _ranges(vars.size()), _sigma(vars.size()) {
00162             for( size_t i = 0; i < vars.size(); ++i )
00163                 _ranges[i] = vars[i].states();
00164             VarSet vs( vars.begin(), vars.end(), vars.size() );
00165             VarSet::const_iterator vs_i = vs.begin();
00166             for( size_t i = 0; i < vs.size(); ++i, ++vs_i )
00167                 _sigma[i] = find( vars.begin(), vars.end(), *vs_i ) - vars.begin();
00168         }
00169 
00171 
00174         size_t convertLinearIndex( size_t li ) const {
00175             size_t N = _ranges.size();
00176 
00177             // calculate vector index corresponding to linear index
00178             std::vector<size_t> vi;
00179             vi.reserve( N );
00180             size_t prod = 1;
00181             for( size_t k = 0; k < N; k++ ) {
00182                 vi.push_back( li % _ranges[k] );
00183                 li /= _ranges[k];
00184                 prod *= _ranges[k];
00185             }
00186 
00187             // convert permuted vector index to corresponding linear index
00188             prod = 1;
00189             size_t sigma_li = 0;
00190             for( size_t k = 0; k < N; k++ ) {
00191                 sigma_li += vi[_sigma[k]] * prod;
00192                 prod *= _ranges[_sigma[k]];
00193             }
00194 
00195             return sigma_li;
00196         }
00197 
00199         const std::vector<size_t>& sigma() const { return _sigma; }
00200 
00202         std::vector<size_t>& sigma() { return _sigma; }
00203 
00205         size_t operator[]( size_t i ) const {
00206 #ifdef DAI_DEBUG
00207             return _sigma.at(i);
00208 #else
00209             return _sigma[i];
00210 #endif
00211         }
00212 };

00234 class multifor {
00235     private:
00237         std::vector<size_t>  _ranges;
00239         std::vector<size_t>  _indices;
00241         long                 _linear_index;
00242 
00243     public:
00245         multifor() : _ranges(), _indices(), _linear_index(0) {}
00246 
00248         multifor( const std::vector<size_t> &d ) : _ranges(d), _indices(d.size(),0), _linear_index(0) {}
00249 
00251         operator size_t() const {
00252             DAI_DEBASSERT( valid() );
00253             return( _linear_index );
00254         }
00255 
00257         size_t operator[]( size_t k ) const {
00258             DAI_DEBASSERT( valid() );
00259             DAI_DEBASSERT( k < _indices.size() );
00260             return _indices[k];
00261         }
00262 
00264         multifor & operator++() {
00265             if( valid() ) {
00266                 _linear_index++;
00267                 size_t i;
00268                 for( i = 0; i != _indices.size(); i++ ) {
00269                     if( ++(_indices[i]) < _ranges[i] )
00270                         break;
00271                     _indices[i] = 0;
00272                 }
00273                 if( i == _indices.size() )
00274                     _linear_index = -1;
00275             }
00276             return *this;
00277         }
00278 
00280         void operator++( int ) {
00281             operator++();
00282         }
00283 
00285         multifor& reset() {
00286             fill( _indices.begin(), _indices.end(), 0 );
00287             _linear_index = 0;
00288             return( *this );
00289         }
00290 
00292         bool valid() const {
00293             return( _linear_index >= 0 );
00294         }
00295 };

00325 class State {
00326     private:
00328         typedef std::map<Var, size_t> states_type;
00329 
00331         long                          state;
00332 
00334         states_type                   states;
00335 
00336     public:
00338         State() : state(0), states() {}
00339 
00341         State( const VarSet &vs, size_t linearState=0 ) : state(linearState), states() {
00342             if( linearState == 0 )
00343                 for( VarSet::const_iterator v = vs.begin(); v != vs.end(); v++ )
00344                     states[*v] = 0;
00345             else {
00346                 for( VarSet::const_iterator v = vs.begin(); v != vs.end(); v++ ) {
00347                     states[*v] = linearState % v->states();
00348                     linearState /= v->states();
00349                 }
00350                 DAI_ASSERT( linearState == 0 );
00351             }
00352         }
00353 
00355         State( const std::map<Var, size_t> &s ) : state(0), states() {
00356             insert( s.begin(), s.end() );
00357         }
00358 
00360         typedef states_type::const_iterator const_iterator;
00361 
00363         const_iterator begin() const { return states.begin(); }
00364 
00366         const_iterator end() const { return states.end(); }
00367 
00369         operator size_t() const {
00370             DAI_ASSERT( valid() );
00371             return( state );
00372         }
00373 
00375         template<typename InputIterator>
00376         void insert( InputIterator b, InputIterator e ) {
00377             states.insert( b, e );
00378             VarSet vars;
00379             for( const_iterator it = begin(); it != end(); it++ )
00380                 vars |= it->first;
00381             state = 0;
00382             state = this->operator()( vars );
00383         }
00384 
00386         const std::map<Var,size_t>& get() const { return states; }
00387 
00389         operator const std::map<Var,size_t>& () const { return states; }
00390 
00392         size_t operator() ( const Var &v ) const {
00393             DAI_ASSERT( valid() );
00394             states_type::const_iterator entry = states.find( v );
00395             if( entry == states.end() )
00396                 return 0;
00397             else
00398                 return entry->second;
00399         }
00400 
00402         size_t operator() ( const VarSet &vs ) const {
00403             DAI_ASSERT( valid() );
00404             size_t vs_state = 0;
00405             size_t prod = 1;
00406             for( VarSet::const_iterator v = vs.begin(); v != vs.end(); v++ ) {
00407                 states_type::const_iterator entry = states.find( *v );
00408                 if( entry != states.end() )
00409                     vs_state += entry->second * prod;
00410                 prod *= v->states();
00411             }
00412             return vs_state;
00413         }
00414 
00416         void operator++( ) {
00417             if( valid() ) {
00418                 state++;
00419                 states_type::iterator entry = states.begin();
00420                 while( entry != states.end() ) {
00421                     if( ++(entry->second) < entry->first.states() )
00422                         break;
00423                     entry->second = 0;
00424                     entry++;
00425                 }
00426                 if( entry == states.end() )
00427                     state = -1;
00428             }
00429         }
00430 
00432         void operator++( int ) {
00433             operator++();
00434         }
00435 
00437         bool valid() const {
00438             return( state >= 0 );
00439         }
00440 
00442         void reset() {
00443             state = 0;
00444             for( states_type::iterator s = states.begin(); s != states.end(); s++ )
00445                 s->second = 0;
00446         }
00447 };
